website_summaries.verdict: Exciting colors using Quantum Dots technology. Brilliant picture is the name of the game.
pros: Quantum Dot technology displays over a billion colors
No bezel screen, picture appears as if it goes to the edge of the set
cons: Occasional problems with the screen blanking out

customer_reviews.title: I love my new TV
customer_reviews.text: I love my new TV! Thanks Amazon for the cashback deal as that helped persuade me to take the bigger option! Although the stand is gorgeous living in earthquake country I ended up having this mounted on the wall. Quality of images in extremely good. Smart TV with wired connection makes streaming things online really easy - no lags. Bought a simple mini bluetooth keyboard and synched like a charm so I can easily type in searches. Synched well with my sound bar, setbox and blueray with easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: LESS THAN A YEAR OLD AND IT NOW HAS A RED LINE THE LEFT SIDE OF THE SCREEN
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping I would be able to enjoy this Samsung TV for a very long time, but less the a year into the purchase it has develop a red line down the left side of the screen, I called Samsung and was on the phone with them for more than an hour without getting a resolution yet. I'll change my rating if i get this problem resolved.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: This TV is fantastic. The colors are unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: This TV is fantastic. The colors are unbelievable. I needed to buy the 2017 model because I had a 50-foot cord pre-run during my house renovations. By the time I got around to buying the TV, the 2017 model was discontinued and the 2018 model was all that was available. Luckily I was able to find this on Amazon. It was $500 cheaper than the local Samsung distributor as well. Absolutely love this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The picture on this TV is amazing. Also, it's very easy to use. Extremely satisfied. Delivery and setup were A+++++++. I would not hesitate to order another large electronics item like this going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Bopp

customer_reviews.title: Picture is very good, great value on this 2017 version of QLED 75"
customer_reviews.text: The picture is so great, really comparable to OLED. I got a great deal buying this 2017 version in 2018. For sound you will need to get a sound bar at least.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Powers

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set up and use. The normal picture quality. Extremely happy so far. The One Connect is very helpful, simple and easy to use. The One remote is excellent and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P Landsberg

customer_reviews.title: Very good television!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV to replace another Samsung TV. So far so good. The pictures are very sharp. I am yet to find out how to fully use the One Remote.
customer_reviews.author: Danielhighlife

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, Great Delivery Service
customer_reviews.text: We have previously owned Pioneer Elite plasma TV's so we are spoiled about clean, crisp images with rich colors. When our 52" Pioneer Elite died about 18 months ago, we replaced it with a standard quality Samsung 65" LED and it was just not as good a picture. We saw this Samsung QLED TV on display at a Big Box store and we really like the picture quality and color richness. The Amazon Delivery contractor was very easy to work with and did a super job getting into the house and unboxing it so we could plug it in a make sure it worked OK. We are very happy with the TV as well as with Amazon's Delivery process.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Truly impressive. Best television I've ever bought in my life. The quality is out of this world and the features are equally as great. Worth ever dime!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Williams

customer_reviews.title: The Samsung QN75Q7 is like bringing the outdoors into your living room
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung QN75Q7 is like bringing the outdoors into your living room. The colors are so vibrant and the picture crisp. The look is sleek and thin compared to the tv we replaced. You don't need to head out to the movies with a picture quality like this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! Lightweight and easy to install. Great performance and color is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Walker

customer_reviews.title: easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: Goodness me, this TV is incredible. Granted I'm upgrading from a nearly decade-old Samsung plasma, but I'm really blown away by the picture quality of this set. I've watched a bunch of 4K UHD content streamed from both Netflix and Amazon, and it's so sharp, so lifelike, so bright and immersive. The unit itself is surprisingly lightweight, easy to mount, and has a fantastic external fiber-optic junction box to plug in all those HDMI cables so you don't have to run a pipe of stuff to the TV itself. Super clean and amazing. I should have upgraded my TV years ago. Amazon delivery was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ToddDominey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality and Samsung isn't honoring their Warrantee. Don't buy this TV or from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Happy !
customer_reviews.text: We love our TV so far! Great quality and sound!
customer_reviews.author: Hirutie

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture. When delivered, I actually recieved the 2018 model. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: David Mayo

customer_reviews.title: great design. Not a big fan of the remote ...
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous picture, great design. Not a big fan of the remote features...but they are growing on me.
customer_reviews.author: David DeWald

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work and they take forever to fix it
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the buy. Doesn’t work and customer service unwilling to get it working in a timely or prompt manner. Pay tons of money for no results in a week without functional tv
customer_reviews.author: KAHomeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for and this TV did not disappoint. Great picture with vivid colors - very pleased with this QLED TV from Samsung. The integrated speakers are OK, but we will be adding a good sound bar to improve audio.
customer_reviews.author: KD Know

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this TV!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this TV! It arrived Dec 4. As soon as Amazon return date expired TV began constantly and repeatedly turning itself on and off and remote unpairing (beg Feb). Impossible to get thru one show! Samsung forum is showing many with same unresolved problem - 4 calls to customer service, two emails (last one unanswered) and so far four service calls and still no fix! TV is under warranty yet Samsung is very uncooperative and we can’t even return it to Amazon at this point! Wish I could give zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: fabtt.brown

customer_reviews.title: If anything goes wrong (and it will) the customer service is absolutetly terrible.  I mean really, really bad.
customer_reviews.text: When the TV actually works, it's pretty good. If anything goes wrong you are pretty much left with a horrible TV for several months as you jump through the ridiculous hoops to get service. If you're really lucky (like me) they'll even lose your ticket and you get to start all over. They absolutely refuse to fix their problems. Will never buy from Samsung again and will be telling everyone I know to stay away from all Samsung products.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks after I got two black lines on the middle of the screen
customer_reviews.author: sterian franc

customer_reviews.title: Horrible tv!  Have to change the settings nearly every time I change the channel!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased up from a Samsung 55" SUHD, 2 years old, the the brand new QLED Q7 65" model, what a disappointment. The colors are awful, the color quality has to be reset for nearly every channel, my old one, once set, I never had to adjust the picture controls. The remote is awful also. Try getting a bit more volume, fat chance, you have to go to settings to even do that! The speaker control does nothing at all, nothing. Closed captioning the same, just a poorly designed tv overall, sending it back, not sure what I'll replace it with, but Anything will be better. The only picture I truly enjoyed, was Amazon Prime 4K programming, fantastic! Overall however, Yuk.
customer_reviews.author: Darby Hicks

customer_reviews.title: One connect is poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: The one connect cable is a one point of failure that causes the entire TV to be useless once this part fails. It is a thin fragile fiber optic cable that can easily break. Once it breaks replacement parts are no longer available by Samsung and finding one that will work with your TV, well good luck. Just research how many have struggled with one connect part and it causing the TV to constantly restart.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good tv , buggy software.
customer_reviews.text: Love the tv but...The software is worse than my black Friday Vizio TV. The HDMI/ARC/CEC support is intermittent and lacking. It will forget input settings when you turn on and off your tv. If you are using this as a stand alone tv it will rock. If you are hooking it up to HDMI sound system you will hate it because it breaks daily.
customer_reviews.author: MadDad

customer_reviews.title: Vertical line FIX
customer_reviews.text: To anyone haven’t vertical line issues, I fixed mine by going to Samsung’s website and downloading the latest firmware and updated it via usb. Please note that the automatic software update on the tv does not have the lastest firmwares like the website does.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: This TV is a pile of garbage for the price.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, all this stupid marketing buzzword crap for QLED and quantum dot rubbish is nonsense. This is a regular backlit LCD TV. For it's price, it is just not worth it. The build quality is crap. Samsung are awesome at what they do; selling rubbish to unsuspecting consumers that don't understand the technology properly. When you put shit in a fake gold plated box and throw in some cubic zirconia you've got a Samsung product. I returned this pile of Samsung and bought myself the Sony XBR-75X900E. Best decision ever, coz now thats a proper TV.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Gee

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture with correct smart TV settings
customer_reviews.text: I really like this TV. My son got this TV for me. I have FIOS and the picture is so great, but the settings have to be on automatic. The picture is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Ravendhran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Stunning picture quality, I am highly impressed with the sharpness of the picture and the lifelike action right in front of me. I actually enjoyed watching a preseason NFL game, which is a first, because I loved my new super defined picture so much. It's like the players were in my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tv and intuitive setup. Heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Great tv. Price pretty steep, but hopefully will laat at least until next big thing. Several reviews ive read are verbose and obviously were submitted to sound like experts, when, obviously the writer needed to learn how the tv works, and all the features it provides. The tv is probably not worth the 6k, but the price will certainly fall and when it reaches your price point, hop on it.
customer_reviews.author: DJeep

customer_reviews.title: Poor manufacturing quality = doesn't meet brightness specs
customer_reviews.text: I went and looked at this set at my local retailer and was shocked to see two identical sets, right next to each other, with the same settings, demonstrating wildly different brightness. I did more research and found that this is a *well known problem*, see YT. Samsung is not offering to repair sets with brightness below the advertised 1000 nits, even for well-known reviewers, and even after sending engineers to actually inspect the sets. I can't imagine why anyone would take a risk on these sets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible TV!!! So happy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV and was blown away by the beautiful colors... this is by far the best TV I've every owned!!!
customer_reviews.author: hawk1

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Do I get a platter of king crab with it, $2600 is just to much for a common person.For $2200 cheaper you can get the un7100 series 7,and all that changes is there aren’t true blacks,and a few less colors, but is that worth an arm and a leg for, I hope not.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: In a month of owning it the remote has died, wifi is erratic, and now the TV is turning itself off and on every couple of minutes. Without the remote I can't use this expensive TV for which I paid about $5000 in my country. I'm not buying a Samsung TV again.
customer_reviews.author: Pier

customer_reviews.title: I went with OLED TV and love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is not even close To OLED, Not worth the high price save your money. I went with OLED TV and love it.
customer_reviews.author: MFS

product_meta.title: Samsung Electronics QN75Q7F 75-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart QLED TV (2017 Model)
product_meta.description: Introducing QLED TV -- you’ll immediately notice a difference. Experience a brilliant picture, enhanced by a billion unique colors created by Samsung’s proprietary Quantum Dots. As smart as it is beautiful, QLED TV senses which devices are plugged in and controls them with one remote, giving you an incredibly intuitive TV experience. The Invisible Connection streamlines connections to the TV and other devices. Watch it all on a gorgeous TV with 360 Degree Design that elegantly fits into your home, whether mounted on the wall or on a TV stand.
feature_bullets: Get more than a billion colors and 100% color volume with exclusive new Quantum Dots
Revel in brilliant whites and layers of depth, revealed even in the deepest, darkest nights. That’s Q contrast
Designed with a no-bezel screen that spills over the edge, the Q looks gorgeous from every side, whether mounted on the wall or on a stand
Absolutely stunning blacks reveal secrets in the shadows with elite detail
Easily access your favorite content and control connected TV devices from one source using the Samsung Smart Remote
NOTE: Refer the User Manual before use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars76 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
